title: Heavy casket

properties.name: description
properties.value: The heavy casket is obtained after completing 200 elite Treasure Trails. It can be used as a weapon, with stats comparable to an iron warhammer.

Heavy casket
Released6 July 2016 (Update)

Weight15 kg
Advanced data
Item ID19941

The heavy casket is obtained after completing 200 elite Treasure Trails. It can be used as a weapon, with stats comparable to an iron warhammer.

It has an Open option, but clicking it results in the message You try with all your might to open it, but you cannot.

It can be stored in the treasure chest in a player-owned house. If lost, it can be re-obtained by completing another elite clue scroll.

[[File:Heavy casket detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''heavy casket''' is obtained after completing 200 [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] [[Treasure Trail]]s. It can be used as a weapon, with stats comparable to an [[iron warhammer]].

It has an ''Open'' option, but clicking it results in the message ''You try with all your might to open it, but you cannot.''

It can be stored in the [[treasure chest]] in a [[player-owned house]]. If lost, it can be re-obtained by completing another elite clue scroll.
